projects.title: Projects
projects.broxelEngineDesc: An innovative 3D engine for interactive media

descriptions.auravention: Unleash your creativity everywhere with the "MindFlow Engine" – the revolutionary, mobile and engine-agnostic development environment for the next generation of games and AI-powered content. The project is researched and developed as part of a master's thesis. AI-powered platform for automatic generation of media content with focus on innovation, automation and co-creation. Develop, design and share flexibly – supported by an integrated asset store and modern team workflows. Auraventions are innovative, AI-powered media and game projects that connect creativity, technology and community in novel ways.
descriptions.projectY: Innovative platform for AI-powered media production and community building. Connects cutting-edge technologies with gamification and teamwork for a unique user experience.
descriptions.broxelEngine: Modular open-source voxel engine (planned 2027) for next-gen games and creative tools. Focus on procedural worlds, modding, cross-platform support and community integration. Based on Bevy Engine.
descriptions.blackForestAsylum: Atmospheric horror adventure (2028) with focus on immersive storytelling, teamwork and community events. Developed in Unreal Engine for an engaging gaming experience.
descriptions.mazeOfSpace: Innovative maze game (2024, prototype in Unity) with planned expansion 2028: New game modes, multiplayer features and creative challenges. Developed in Godot.
descriptions.blockReversal: Casual game classic (2018, prototype in Unity) with planned 3D sequel "Universal Blox" (2028): New game modes, modern graphics, multiplayer and cross-platform. Developed in Unity and prospectively on Broxel Engine.
descriptions.slime: Physics-based party game (2017/2029, prototype in Unity): Control a slime, suck up items and master fun challenges. 2029 as multiplayer party game in Bevy Engine.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate developer specializing in creating interactive media solutions. With a focus on cross-platform development, 3D technologies, and artificial intelligence, I create innovative digital experiences.

details.focusSoftwareDataAI: Focus: Software, Data & AI + Interactive 3D (Game Dev)
details.thesisGamification: Business Informatics (Thesis: Potentials of Gamification in Business Application Systems, Grade: 1.3)

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Let's work together! I'm always open to new projects and exciting challenges.
contact.workTogetherDesc: I'm always open to exciting projects and new challenges. Whether it's Flutter development, Unity projects, or innovative media platforms - let's create something amazing together!

footer.copyright: © 2025 Bjarne Niklas Luttermann. All rights reserved.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.content: This website does not collect or store any personal data. No cookies are set and no tracking is used.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you send me inquiries by e-mail, your details from the e-mail, including the contact details you provide there, will be stored for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. I will not pass on this data without your consent.
contact.caption: For questions about data protection, please contact: aurav.tech@gmail.com

serverlog.title: Server Log Files
serverlog.content: The provider of these pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. This data cannot be assigned to specific persons. This data is not merged with other data sources.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient and the purpose of data processing as well as a right to correction, blocking or deletion of this data.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.content: The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Third-party contributions are marked as such.
